'''''"Tupayo's Aid"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Duelist: Series II]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Burning-Aflame Wayob Manifestation|text="Tupayo's Aid" &mdash; Will of Honor and Glory}} without any characters being downed.
